headline: Berkshire Hathaway 13F Filing Reveals Warren Buffett's Secret Stock
summary: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway revealed a position in embattled healthcare giant UnitedHealth Group while showing smaller stakes in longtime holdings Apple and Bank of America, according to a regulatory filing Thursday.

headline: Energy Transition Today - Streetleaf Expands Team to Boost Sustainable Infrastructure Nationwide
summary: Streetleaf, a prominent provider of solar-powered streetlighting services in the U.S., is continuing to strengthen its operations by appointing Brandy Potter and Kristen Proud as new Account Managers to serve customers in Texas and Florida. These appointments aim to enhance Streetleaf's customer service and support its mission to advance sustainable infrastructure across communities nationwide. Through the growth of its expert team, the company seeks to accelerate the transition to renewable...

headline: Lubricants Market worth $204.10 billion by 2030, at a CAGR of 2.8%, says MarketsandMarkets™
summary: Delray Beach, FL, Aug. 14, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Lubricants Market was valued at USD 178.14 billion in 2025 and is projected to reach USD 204.10 billion by 2030, growing at 2.8% CAGR from 2025 to 2030. The demand for lubricants in end-use industries such as transportation and industrial is increasing due to government regulations and fuel economy norms, mounting demand from marine applications, and extension of refinery volumes for group II and III base oil. Download PDF Brochure: https:/
